iqs_ireddentalism_title;Iroquois Irredentism;x
iqs_ireddentalism_desc;The Iroquois also came into conflict with the French in the later 17th century. The French were allies of their enemies, the Algonquins and Hurons, and after the Iroquois had destroyed the Huron confederacy in 1648–50, they launched devastating raids on New France for the next decade and a half. They were then temporarily checked by successive French expeditions against them in 1666 and 1687, but, after the latter attack, led by the marquis de Denonville, the Iroquois once again carried the fight into the heart of French territory, wiping out Lachine, near Montreal, in 1689. These wars were finally ended by a series of successful campaigns by New France’s governor, the comte de Frontenac, against the Iroquois in 1693–96. The time has come for us to retake our rightful lands to the west and put an end to the western colonists;x

mughal_conquest_desc;With the decline of the Mughals in all parts of India, their authority in the remaining parts is very weak and their power has waned. With the Mughal attention fixed in the north, perhaps this is the best time to turn the tables and conquer parts of Mughal India.....before someone else does!;x
abolish_mughal_supremacy_title;Abolish Mughal Supremacy;x
abolish_mughal_supremacy_desc;The final fall of the Mughal banner from Delhi ended their empire but not their Timurid legacy. Even now, the entire India continues to live under the shadow of its Mughal past. Their institutions, their laws and their titles are still being honourably maintained by many of the newly independent princes and many Mughal princes continue to harbour dreams of reconquest from exile. It is time we start a campaign of words to slowly and surely erase their legacy and rid India of the Mughal plaque once and for all.;x

At that time they called him The mountain rat" or "The bandit". But today we Marathas rule a huge realm full of diverse people's and cultures. Our army is a pride of India. Now it's time to declare ourselves as a real Empire. A proud Empire with its own laws
column4: its own institutions and its own power. At last Chhatrapati Shivaji's legacy has come a full circle. We bow to his great soul!;x
